column3: obiara a nsukɔm dze no no
column5: na nyia onnyi sika; hom mbra mbɔtɔ
column7: hom mbra mbɔtɔ wenyin na numfonsu a wɔnndze sika na wonntwa bo so."

column2: "Ebɛnadze ntsi na hom hwer sika ma dza ɔnnyɛ edziban
column3: na hom berɛ ma dza ɔmmee? Hom nyɛ aso mma me yie
column5: na hom mma angoanam nyɛ hom kra dɛw."

column3: na hom mbra me nkyɛn; hom ntsie
column4: na hom akra bɛtsena ase: na menye hom bedzi ɔdomankoma ahyɛmu. David n'ehumbɔbɔr a osi pi no a."

column3: medze no ama dɛ aman hɔn dasefo

column4: na ɔman a wonnyim wo no
column7: na Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ntsi; na ɔno na ɔahyɛ wo enyimnyam."

column2: "Hom nhwehwɛ EWURADZE ber a wobohu no yi
column3: hom mfrɛ no ber a ɔbɛn yi:"

column2: "hom mma omumuyɛnyi ndan no kwan ngya
column3: na ɔbrakyewnyi ndan n'adwen ngya: na ɔnsan mbra EWURADZE nkyɛn
column4: na obohu no mbɔbɔr; na hɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn

column3: eso nnyɛ hom akwan nye m'akwan

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ ɔsorsor krɔn bɔ asaase do no
column3: dɛmara na m'akwan krɔn bɔ hom akwan do
column4: na m'adwen bɔ hom adwen do."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ nsu na esukwankyɛba fi sor gu famu
column5: na ɔma ofifir aba na ɔbɔ nhyiren

column2: "mbrɛ asɛm a ofi m'anomu fir no ɔbɛyɛ ara nye no: ɔrennsan mmba mo hɔ kwa
column4: na ɔayɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ dza osian ntsi ma mosomaa no no mu."

column3: na wɔdze asomdwee egya hom kwan: mbepɔw na akoko bɛfa ehurusi ndwom edzi hom enyim
column4: na hamu ndua nyinara abobɔ hɔn nsamu."

column3: na ohuam dua efir kɔkrɔw ananmu: na ɔbɛyɛ nkaa dzin ama EWURADZE
column4: na daa asɛnkyerɛdze a worunntwa nnkyen."
